original_text: Even those that were numbered of them, throughout their families, by the house of their fathers, were two thousand and six hundred and thirty.
korean_text: 그 종족과 조상의 가문을 따라 계수된 자는 이천육백삼십 명이니

sentences.original_text: Even those that were numbered of them
by the house of their fathers
were two thousand and six hundred and thirty
